knimeNode.name: Shapefile Point Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads in Points from ESRI Shapefiles.

fullDescription.intro: Reads points from ESRI shapefiles. The out port contains the points plus metadata. The points may be visualized via the "Open Street Map" nodes.
fullDescription.option: Enter a valid *.shp file here. The related *.dbf, *.shx and all optional files have to be in the same folder.

ports.outPort: All imported points. "Latitude" and "Longitude" are in the respective columns. May be used as input for the first port of the "Open Street Map" nodes.
